message.body: So what did you think of the newsroom finale?
absolutely loved it. Even the corny Sex and City pun was great. Also... I'm gonna kidnap Olivia Munn. Can't wait for season 2 What about you?

I groaned at the sex and the city thing but also laughed. Overall I liked it and am looking forward to season 2, but I really do wish he'd give it a rest on the Maggie-Jim thing. I just find it an annoying distraction.
